Question: What are the names of the restaurants offering "Italian" cuisine that have a rating of more than "4.0", located less than "2km" from the city center of "Rome", and visited by at least "3" different tourists from "France" in "2023"?
Cypher:
MATCH (restaurant:Restaurant {cuisine:"Italian"})-[located:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City {name:"Rome"})
WHERE restaurant.rating > 4.0 AND located.distance_km < 2
MATCH (tourist:Tourist {nationality:"France"})-[dined:DINED_AT]->(restaurant)
WHERE dined.date.year = 2023
WITH restaurant, COUNT(DISTINCT tourist) AS uniqueTourists
WHERE uniqueTourists >= 3
RETURN restaurant, located, city, dined, tourist, restaurant.name

Question: List the names of cities that have more than "1000000" population, hosting attractions rated above "4.5" and which are within "5km" distance from hotels having a minimum of "4" stars.
Cypher:
MATCH (city:City)-[locatedAttraction:LOCATED_IN]->(attraction:Attraction)
MATCH (hotel:Hotel)-[locatedHotel:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE city.population > 1000000 AND attraction.rating > 4.5 AND locatedHotel.distance_km < 5 AND hotel.stars >= 4
RETURN city, locatedAttraction, attraction, hotel, locatedHotel, city.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (city:City)-[locatedAttraction:LOCATED_IN]-(attraction:Attraction)
MATCH (hotel:Hotel)-[locatedHotel:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE city.population > 1000000 AND attraction.rating > 4.5 AND locatedHotel.distance_km < 5 AND hotel.stars >= 4
RETURN city, locatedAttraction, attraction, hotel, locatedHotel, city.name
Rewrite: Provide the names of cities with a population exceeding "1000000", containing attractions with a rating over "4.5", and located within "5km" of hotels rated at least "4" stars.

Question: Identify the names and types of attractions in "Barcelona" with a rating of at least "4.2", that are situated less than "3km" from the city center and have been recommended with comments mentioning "beautiful view".
Cypher:
MATCH (attraction:Attraction)-[locatedIn:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City {name:"Barcelona"})
MATCH (tourist:Tourist)-[recommend:RECOMMENDS]->(attraction)
WHERE attraction.rating >= 4.2 AND locatedIn.distance_km < 3 AND recommend.comment CONTAINS "beautiful view"
RETURN attraction, locatedIn, city, tourist, recommend, attraction.name, attraction.type
Rewrite: Find attractions in "Barcelona" that have a minimum rating of "4.2", are located within "3km" of the city center, and are praised for their "beautiful view", along with identifying their names and categories.

Question: Provide the names of tourists from "Japan" who have visited at least "3" different cities, staying in hotels rated above "3.5 stars", and have dined at restaurants serving "sushi" during their visits in "2021".
Cypher:
MATCH (tourist:Tourist {nationality:"Japan"})-[:VISITED]->(attraction:Attraction)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City),
      (tourist)-[stayed:STAYED_AT]->(hotel:Hotel)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(city),
      (tourist)-[dine:DINED_AT]->(restaurant:Restaurant)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE hotel.stars > 3.5 AND restaurant.cuisine = "sushi" AND dine.date.year = 2021
WITH tourist, COUNT(DISTINCT city) AS cities_visited
WHERE cities_visited >= 3
RETURN tourist, attraction, city, stayed, hotel, dine, restaurant, dine.date, tourist.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (tourist:Tourist {nationality:"Japan"})-[relation5:VISITED]->(attraction:Attraction)-[relation10:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City),
      (tourist)-[stayed:STAYED_AT]->(hotel:Hotel)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(city),
      (tourist)-[dine:DINED_AT]->(restaurant:Restaurant)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE hotel.stars > 3.5 AND restaurant.cuisine = "sushi" AND dine.date.year = 2021
WITH tourist, COUNT(DISTINCT city) AS cities_visited
WHERE cities_visited >= 3
RETURN relation10, relation5, tourist, attraction, city, stayed, hotel, dine, restaurant, dine.date, tourist.name

Question: Can you list hotels with a "5-star" rating in "Paris" that are located within "1km" of any top-rated attraction (rating strictly greater than "4.6") and also have reviews from tourists mentioning "exquisite service" in "2020"?
Cypher:
MATCH (hotel:Hotel {stars:5})-[:LOCATED_IN {distance_km:1}]->(city:City {name:"Paris"})
MATCH (hotel)-[recommendHotel:RECOMMENDS]->(tourist:Tourist)
MATCH (attraction:Attraction {rating:4.6})-[:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE recommendHotel.comment CONTAINS "exquisite service" AND recommendHotel.rating.year=2020
RETURN hotel, city, attraction, recommendHotel, tourist, hotel.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (hotel:Hotel {stars:5})-[relation4:LOCATED_IN {distance_km:1}]->(city:City {name:"Paris"})
MATCH (hotel)-[recommendHotel:RECOMMENDS]-(tourist:Tourist)
MATCH (attraction:Attraction {rating:4.6})-[relation6:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE recommendHotel.comment CONTAINS "exquisite service" AND recommendHotel.rating.year=2020
RETURN relation6, relation4, hotel, city, attraction, recommendHotel, tourist, hotel.name
Rewrite: Could you provide a list of "5-star" hotels in "Paris" situated less than "1km" away from a highly-rated attraction (with a rating over "4.6") that also received tourist reviews in "2020" highlighting "exquisite service"?

Question: What are the details of "Chinese" restaurants in "New York City" that are rated over "4.3", located no more than "1.5km" from any city landmark, and have been visited by tourists staying at the "Ritz Carlton" in "2022"?
Cypher:
MATCH (restaurant:Restaurant)-[locatedIn:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City {name:"New York City"})
MATCH (restaurant)<-[recommendRestaurant:RECOMMENDS]-(tourist:Tourist)-[stayedAt:STAYED_AT]->(hotel:Hotel {name:"Ritz Carlton"})
WHERE restaurant.cuisine = "Chinese" AND restaurant.rating > 4.3 AND locatedIn.distance_km <= 1.5 AND stayedAt.check_in.year = 2022
RETURN restaurant, locatedIn, city, recommendRestaurant, tourist, stayedAt, hotel, restaurant.name, restaurant.cuisine, restaurant.rating
Rewrite: Can you provide information on "Chinese" restaurants in "New York City" with ratings above "4.3", situated within "1.5km" of a city landmark, and visited by tourists from the "Ritz Carlton" in "2022"?

Question: What is the average duration in minutes of visits to historical attractions by tourists who have stayed in hotels located less than "1km" from these attractions in "London" during "2021"?
Cypher:
MATCH (hotel:Hotel)-[hotelLoc:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City {name:"London"})
MATCH (attraction:Attraction {type:"historical"})-[attractionLoc:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
MATCH (tourist:Tourist)-[visited:VISITED]->(attraction)
MATCH (tourist)-[stayed:STAYED_AT]->(hotel)
WHERE hotelLoc.distance_km < 1 AND stayed.check_in.year = 2021
RETURN tourist, hotel, city, attraction, hotelLoc, attractionLoc, visited, stayed, avg(visited.duration_minutes)
Rewrite: How long, on average, do tourists spend visiting historical sites in "London" when they lodge in hotels situated within "1km" of these attractions, specifically during "2021"?

Question: How long, on average, do tourists from "Italy" spend dining at restaurants which serve "Mediterranean" cuisine and are situated within "2km" distance from their hotels in "Athens"?
Cypher:
MATCH (tourist:Tourist {nationality:"Italy"})-[dine:DINED_AT]->(restaurant:Restaurant {cuisine:"Mediterranean"})
MATCH (restaurant)<-[restaurantLocated:LOCATED_IN]-(city:City {name:"Athens"})
MATCH (tourist)-[stay:STAYED_AT]->(hotel:Hotel)-[hotelLocated:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE restaurantLocated.distance_km <= 2
RETURN tourist, dine, restaurant, restaurantLocated, city, stay, hotel, hotelLocated, avg(dine.duration_minutes)

Question: What are the common factors found in comments made by tourists who gave a "5-star" recommendation to luxury hotels in "Dubai" that are within "1 km" from famous malls and have dined in high-rated local cuisine restaurants?
Cypher:
MATCH (hotel:Hotel {stars:5})-[:LOCATED_IN {distance_km:1}]->(city:City {name:"Dubai"}),
      (mall:Attraction {type:"mall"})-[:LOCATED_IN {distance_km:1}]->(city),
      (restaurant:Restaurant)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(city),
      (tourist:Tourist)-[hotelRecommend:RECOMMENDS]->(hotel),
      (tourist)-[dine:DINED_AT]->(restaurant)
WHERE hotelRecommend.rating = 5 AND restaurant.cuisine = "local" AND restaurant.rating >= 4.5
RETURN tourist, hotelRecommend, hotel, city, mall, restaurant, dine, hotelRecommend.comment
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (hotel:Hotel {stars:5})-[relation5:LOCATED_IN {distance_km:1}]->(city:City {name:"Dubai"}),
      (mall:Attraction {type:"mall"})-[relation6:LOCATED_IN {distance_km:1}]->(city),
      (restaurant:Restaurant)-[relation7:LOCATED_IN]->(city),
      (tourist:Tourist)-[hotelRecommend:RECOMMENDS]->(hotel),
      (tourist)-[dine:DINED_AT]->(restaurant)
WHERE hotelRecommend.rating = 5 AND restaurant.cuisine = "local" AND restaurant.rating >= 4.5
RETURN relation7, relation6, relation5, tourist, hotelRecommend, hotel, city, mall, restaurant, dine, hotelRecommend.comment
Rewrite: What common elements are noted in feedback from tourists who rated luxury hotels in "Dubai" with "5 stars," located less than "1 km" from well-known shopping centers, and who have eaten at top-rated local restaurants?

Question: Compare the average tourist rating for attractions located under "1km" from their visiting city's center versus those further away, particularly for cities with over "2 million" population.
Cypher:
MATCH (attraction:Attraction)-[locatedNear:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City)
WHERE city.population > 2000000
WITH city, attraction, locatedNear,
     CASE
       WHEN locatedNear.distance_km < 1 THEN 'Under 1km'
       ELSE 'Over 1km'
     END AS distanceCategory
MATCH (tourist:Tourist)-[recommend:RECOMMENDS]->(attraction)
RETURN city, attraction, locatedNear, tourist, recommend, distanceCategory, avg(recommend.rating) AS avgRating
GROUP BY distanceCategory, city
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (attraction:Attraction)-[locatedNear:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City)
WHERE city.population > 2000000
WITH city, attraction, locatedNear,
     CASE
       WHEN locatedNear.distance_km < 1 THEN 'Under 1km'
       ELSE 'Over 1km'
     END AS distanceCategory
MATCH (tourist:Tourist)-[recommend:RECOMMENDS]->(attraction)
RETURN city, attraction, locatedNear, tourist, recommend, distanceCategory, avg(recommend.rating) AS avgRating
GROUP BY distanceCategory

Question: Can you determine the typical check-out times for tourists who checked into beachfront hotels and visited nearby seaside restaurants during their stay in "Miami" in the summer of "2022"?
Cypher:
MATCH (hotel:Hotel)<-[stayed:STAYED_AT]-(tourist:Tourist)-[visited:VISITED]->(restaurant:Restaurant)-[restaurantLocated:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City {name:"Miami"})
MATCH (hotel)-[hotelLocated:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE hotel.stars = 5 AND hotelLocated.distance_km <= 1 AND restaurantLocated.distance_km <= 1 AND restaurant.cuisine CONTAINS "seafood"
AND stayed.check_in.year=2022 AND stayed.check_in.month>=6 AND stayed.check_in.month<=8
RETURN tourist, stayed, hotel, visited, restaurant, hotelLocated, restaurantLocated, city, stayed.check_out

Question: What are the frequency and types of meals preferred by tourists who stay at luxury hotels (above "4 stars") and dine at nearby restaurants within "500 meters" in "Las Vegas"?
Cypher:
MATCH (hotel:Hotel)-[hotelLocated:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City {name:"Las Vegas"})
WHERE hotel.stars > 4
MATCH (tourist:Tourist)-[stayed:STAYED_AT]->(hotel)
MATCH (tourist)-[dined:DINED_AT]->(restaurant:Restaurant)-[restaurantLocated:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE restaurantLocated.distance_km <= 0.5
RETURN tourist, stayed, hotel, hotelLocated, city, dined, restaurant, restaurantLocated, dined.meal, COUNT(dined.meal)
Rewrite: What types and frequency of meals do tourists who stay in luxury hotels (over "4 stars") and eat at adjoining restaurants within "500 meters" in "Las Vegas" prefer?

Question: Calculate the average distance between hotels and attractions in cities with more than "500,000" population, where the attractions have a rating of "3.5" or higher.
Cypher:
MATCH (hotel:Hotel)-[hotelLocation:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City)<-[attractionLocation:LOCATED_IN]-(attraction:Attraction)
WHERE city.population > 500000 AND attraction.rating >= 3.5
RETURN AVG(hotelLocation.distance_km + attractionLocation.distance_km) AS averageDistance
Rewrite: Determine the mean distance between hotels and attractions in cities where the population exceeds 500,000, and the attractions are rated 3.5 or above.

Question: What is the average number of restaurants with a rating of at least "4" within "2km" of city centers for cities that are capitals in Europe?
Cypher:
MATCH (restaurant:Restaurant)-[locatedIn:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City)
WHERE city.country = "Europe" AND city.capital = true AND restaurant.rating >= 4.0 AND locatedIn.distance_km <= 2
RETURN city.name AS CapitalCity, AVG(count(restaurant)) AS AvgRestaurantsNearby

Question: Compute the mean number of tourist visits to attractions that are rated above "4" and are located in cities on seaside locations.
Rewrite: Calculate the average number of tourist visits to attractions rated over "4" situated in coastal cities.

Question: What is the maximum rating received by any hotel in "Tokyo" that is connected via recommendations to attractions rated lower than "3.5"?
Rewrite: What is the highest rating achieved by any hotel in "Tokyo" that is linked through recommendations to attractions with ratings below "3.5"?

Question: Calculate the minimum rating of restaurants located no more than "1km" away from top-rated (above "4.5") hotels in any major North American cities.
Cypher:
MATCH (restaurant:Restaurant)-[restaurantLocation:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City)
WHERE city.country IN ["Canada", "United States", "Mexico"] AND city.population >= 1000000
WITH restaurant, restaurantLocation
MATCH (hotel:Hotel)-[hotelLocation:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE hotel.rating > 4.5 AND hotelLocation.distance_km <= 1
RETURN MIN(restaurant.rating)
Rewrite: Determine the lowest rating of eateries situated within "1km" of highly-rated (over "4.5") hotels in any principal cities of North America.

Question: What is the sum of distances in kilometers that tourists travelled to visit attractions from their respective hotels in "Venice" during the annual Carnival seasons of the past "5 years"?
Cypher:
MATCH (hotel:Hotel)-[hotelLocated:LOCATED_IN]->(city:City {name: "Venice"}),
      (tourist:Tourist)-[stayed:STAYED_AT]->(hotel),
      (tourist)-[visited:VISITED]->(attraction:Attraction)-[attractionLocated:LOCATED_IN]->(city)
WHERE date(visited.date).year >= date().year - 5 AND date(visited.date).month = 2 // Assuming Carnival is in February
RETURN SUM(attractionLocated.distance_km)
Rewrite: What is the total distance in kilometers that tourists covered to reach attractions from their hotels in "Venice" over the last "5 years" during the annual Carnival periods?
